company_info.name: Swiggy
company_info.description: Swiggy is India's leading on-demand delivery platform offering food delivery, Instamart grocery delivery, Swiggy Genie pickup & drop, and restaurant logistics.
company_info.mission: To elevate the quality of life for urban consumers by offering unparalleled convenience.

verticals.name: Food Delivery
verticals.description: Order food from thousands of restaurants with real-time tracking & fast delivery.

verticals.name: Instamart
verticals.description: Instant grocery delivery in minutes. Daily essentials, snacks, fruits, veggies & more.

verticals.name: Swiggy Genie
verticals.description: Pickup & drop anything within your city — parcels, keys, food, documents.

verticals.name: Restaurant Onboarding
verticals.description: A program for restaurants to partner with Swiggy and expand their customer base.

faqs.question: How does Swiggy work?
faqs.answer: You place an order, the restaurant prepares the food, and a delivery partner brings it to your doorstep.

faqs.question: Does Swiggy offer grocery delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes! Through Swiggy Instamart you can order groceries and essentials in minutes.

faqs.question: How can restaurants partner with Swiggy?
faqs.answer: Restaurants can join via the Swiggy Partner Portal. Our team helps with onboarding and menu setup.

faqs.question: What is Swiggy Genie?
faqs.answer: Swiggy Genie lets you send or pick up anything in your city—documents, keys, lunch boxes, etc.

faqs.question: Is there a subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, Swiggy One provides unlimited free deliveries, discounts, and priority support.
